Key Match Events: Aaron Judge hit a two-run homer off Hunter Gaddis in the first inning
Judge's homer gave the Yankees a cushion in the game
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Manager Aaron Boone mentioned that it's good to see Judge put one in the seats and give the team a cushion
Miscellaneous Highlights: The victory gives the Yankees a commanding 2-0 lead in the ALCS
The Yankees' bullpen performed admirably, with Clay Holmes, Tim Hill, and Tommy Kahnle combining for 3 2/3 scoreless innings
